attributes.description: Welcome to Fury Mazda Fourways Pre-Owned. We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles that you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles comes with a Full Service History, spare keys and undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a road worthy test. We offer the best possible finance deals tailored to your needs and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. Contact us to become part of the Hatfield family.

attributes.description: At Lexus East Rand, we learn from the past, build on the present and anticipate the future. While the obsession with perfection has not waned, the Lexus brand has advanced into something much bigger than just a motoring marque. Lexus has become a way of life. This is evident in the way that the brand has been sharing its passion for craftsmanship by partnering with world-renowned artists, supporting up-and-coming designers, and working to create amazing from film to fashion. It seems to make sense that the Lexus tagline will change from “The Pursuit of Perfection” to “Experience Amazing”. The need to experience amazing compels us as a corporate to engage in international discourse and meet the needs of those communities whose lives we are looking to enrich. This means going beyond the manufacturing of vehicles. So here at Lexus East Rand; we strive to give our customers exactly that, an Amazing Experience, from start to finish.
